column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Love the food
column2: and the atmosphere. The prices are a little above average
column3: but worth it. The only reason it gets 4 stars is because of the absolutely ridiculous wait times during the busy hour. You can expect to wait up to two hours. I will say though
column4: that they do get you in and out fast. I know it's only that busy because it's that good
column5: but if you plan on just "going out for breakfast" this isn't a quick bite during peak hours.
